text: Chimp or chimpanzee is a species of great ape native to the forests and savannas of tropical Africa. Chimp(s) or The Chimp may also refer to: *The Chimp (1932 film), a Laurel and Hardy short film *Chimps: So Like Us, a 1980 documentary film *The Chimp (2001 film), a Kyrgyz film *Chimps Inc., an animal sanctuary in Oregon, United States ==See also== * or * or *Chimpanzee (disambiguation)
title: Chimp (disambiguation)
